column3:
utACK f3f8d2e

Nit: `GetTotalBlocksEstimate` is no longer used (only in tests). Feel free to remove that now.
utACK - certainly a more reliable metric.\n
I wonder if this should be backported to 0.13.2, as it fixes a visible issue on testnet.\n
utACK e141beb6a9816b7e1e680fb0a8bae16d42a3e557 very clean to read commit by commit.\n
Nit: I think you want to move this up to the section " Before every minor and major release:"\n
Where is this number from please?\n
@rebroad It is mentioned in the doc change in this very pull...\n
You can just run the getblockchaininfo rpc per the instructions and observe that its a number equal to or greater than that in order to verify it. :)\n
Any particular reason to use GetTime here over GetAdjustedTime?\n
